item.title: Mutt with gmail like labelling
item.description: Finally, I stumbled upon something on how to manage labels in mutt. See this post . I have been using mutt for two years but I never really needed this feature. As the usage of email is increasing, this is a great way to label the emails. It is much better than tagging. Good thing about it that it adds label to ‘X-label’ field of the mail itself and display it in the pager.
